hits.definition:
离 (F 離)

[lí] (= 离开 líkāi) leave, from

虽 (F 雖)

[suī] (= 虽然 suīrán) although

编 (F 編)

[biān] weave, organize, (= 编辑 biānjí) edit

宝 (F 寶)

[bǎo] treasure

谈 (F 談)

[tán] talk

府

[fǔ] 政府 zhèngfǔ government

拉

[lā] pull, drag, haul

[lǎ] 半拉 bànlǎ half

[lá] slit

[là] 拉拉蛄 làlagù mole cricket

且

[qiě] for the time being;

    而且 érqiě furthermore

[jū] (only used some personal names)

格

[gé] check, pattern, standard;

    格外 géwài especially

[gē] <the sound of laughter, clicking of a hen>, chuckel

尽

[jìn] (F 盡) use up

[jǐn] (F 儘) to max extent; 尽管 jǐnguǎn even though

剑 (F 劍)

[jiàn] sword; 宝剑 bǎojiàn double-edged sword

讲 (F 講)

[jiǎng] speak, explain, discuss, stress

布

[bù] cloth, spread

杀 (F 殺)

[shā] kill, fight, weaken, reduce, burn (of medicine)

微

[wēi] tiny, micro; 微笑 wēixiào smile

怕

[pà] (= 害怕 hàipà) to fear; 可怕 kěpà horrible
